A few notes & reminders as we welcome our students back tomorrow morning, Thursday, August 13th.

1. All students will have their temperature checked on arrival.
2. Students eating school breakfast will enter through the front doors of the high school tomorrow. Students not eating school breakfast will report to the Veasy Center. Doors will open at 7:40 a.m.

We want to be sure we have our students entered correctly. Do not stress. We are working together. Virtual students do not need to come to the high school tomorrow.

-Most of all we are excited to begin another school year and welcome everyone back. We are all in this together and we are committed to making this the best year yet.

LHS
